# The Completionist - Distribution

A Super Mario Galaxy progress tracker.

## Requirements

- Java 17 or higher installed on your system

## How to Run

### macOS / Linux
```bash
./the-completionist.sh
```

Or directly:
```bash
java -jar the-completionist.jar
```

### Windows
Double-click `the-completionist.bat` or run:
```cmd
java -jar the-completionist.jar
```

## Check Java Version

Make sure you have Java 17+ installed:
```bash
java -version
```

If you don't have Java, download it from:
- https://adoptium.net/ (Temurin - recommended)
- https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/downloads/

## Files

- `the-completionist.jar` - The application (run with java -jar)
- `the-completionist.sh` - macOS/Linux launcher script
- `the-completionist.bat` - Windows launcher script

## Save Data

Your progress is saved in the `data/profiles/` folder created next to the JAR file.
